Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Olympus \Olympus\ prop. n. A mountain in Northeastern Greece; -- it was believed by ancient Greeks to be the dwelling place of the gods.
Syn: Mount Olympus, Mt. Olympus, Olimbos. [WordNet 1.5]

Olympus n : a mountain peak in northeast Greece near the Aegean coast; believed by ancient Greeks to be the dwelling place of the gods (9,570 feet high) [syn: {Mount Olympus}, {Mt. Olympus}, {Olimbos}]
